plot: Farewell braids, curls and other haircuts! Their time is now over. Director Christina Höglund lost all her hair within three months.
title: (Vikten av) Hår
plot_es: Farewell braids, curls and other haircuts! Their time is now over. Director Christina Höglund lost all her hair within three months.
plot_en: Farewell braids, curls and other haircuts! Their time is now over. Director Christina Höglund lost all her hair within three months.
